WorkItem.ClosedComment: This problem was caused by the recent armory update.Blizzard changed the talent icons from .gif to .jpg - and reduced their size from 43x43 down to 31x31. This resulted in incorrect URL's being passed into the Rawr file downloader, which meant that talent icons could not be downloaded and saved to the talent_images cache. This also resulted in very long application startup times.Fixed in changeset 44284.
WorkItem.Description: When Rawr starts downloading images for the talent trees it can't find the images online. The result is talent trees without talent icons and an extremely long start up time for rawr.
WorkItem.Summary: Talent image download points to wrong URL
